short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Forward automates skill-based job hunting: Upload your resume, Express your preferences, Track applications — all ad-free.

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Introducing Forward – Your AI-powered job-hunting assistant!

Tired of navigating multiple job sites every day? Forward automates your job hunt and gives you more control with less effort. Say goodbye to limited search bars on traditional portals. Instead, Forward uses a skill-based approach to bring you personalized, highly accurate job recommendations from platforms like LinkedIn and Indeed—all without ads or sponsored listings.

Key Features:

-    AI-Driven Job Recommendations: Get matches based on all your skills and experiences, not just simple keywords.
-    Multiple Personas: Create up to 3 different profiles to explore diverse career paths simultaneously without redoing your preferences.
-    Easy Setup: Input your details and describe your dream job; Forward will automatically bring you the latest jobs in your field every day.
-    Ad-Free Experience: No irrelevant results or sponsored listings cluttering your search.
-    Visa Sponsorship Filter: Filter out job descriptions that don't sponsor visas—a handy feature for international students.
-    Ideal for Internships: Works great for internship searches too!

Whether you’re unsure of what to search for or feeling overwhelmed by job market trends pushing you toward AI or Data, Forward provides a platform where you can slow down, review your tailored matches, and make smarter career decisions.

Simplify and enhance your job-hunting journey with Forward—making it more efficient, personalized, and stress-free. Perfect for anyone looking to take the hassle out of job hunting.

---

**Forward currently supports Engineering and STEM positions in the USA.**  
––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––––

By downloading this extension, you agree to our Terms of Service (https://useforward.app/terms) and Privacy Policy (https://useforward.app/privacy).

**Note:** This extension uses Google Analytics to help us improve your experience with Forward.
